head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths OROFINO, FRANK ALLEN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths OROFINO, FRANK ALLEN

block.p: OROFINO-Frank Allen on July 14, 2000. Chairman and founder of the the Allen Dental Medical Corp. Member of the Board of Directors, Cabrini Hospital, Charter Member, Century Club, NY University Dental College. Life Member, N.Y. Veteran Police Association. President, N.Y. State Honorary Fire Chiefs Association. Author of the book ''The Legend of John Fitzgerald Kennedy.'' Member of N.Y. Athletic Club. Beloved husband of Ida. Loving father of Richard, Paul, Raymond, and John. Cherished grandfather of Richele, Richard, Jeannene and James. Great-grandfather of two. Dear brother of Peter. Reposing at the Frederick Funeral Home of Flushing, Northern Boulevard at 193rd Street. Interment Monday, 11 AM, Mount St. Mary's Cemetery.
